data.title: Alden & Harlow
data.text:
Looking to plan a private party? Alden & Harlow hosts corporate events, weddings and celebrations of all kinds. We have multiple event spaces available to host tasting menus for large groups, small private parties, partial dining room buyouts and full buyouts of the entire restaurant. For menu selection we offer cocktail style hors d’oeuvres, seated tastings or stationary buffets of your selection off our house menus while also catering to off-menu requests. Please reach out for any additional info- we look forward to hearing more about your event!

For inquiries please fill out the form below or email events@aldenharlow.com
